item.description:
Kimberly is starting a new shopping concept for Boston:

If you’ve been looking for a retail presence but can’t afford to rent a store well there is a new selling concept coming to Boston that can solve your problem. Think of it as the San Lorenzo Market in Florence, a crafts fair and Girl’s Night Out all rolled into one at the" ID Market (independent designers)".

Kimberly has secured a venue in the South end on Tremont Street, beginning in September, not far from the cyclorama building. You rent space to sell your wares on the weekend.

If you design or sell apparel, jewelery or accessories, or if you are a photographer or fine artists then you should come to this networking event to learn more about the ID market and to network with others interested in a place to sell.
item.name: Networking meetup with Kimberly Benson
